risk_overview.business_description: Manufacturing of precision metal components and assemblies for the automotive industry, specialising in CNC machined parts, stamped components, and sub-assemblies for major UK and European vehicle manufacturers.

risk_management.environmental_management_commitment: The company has implemented a comprehensive Environmental Management System (EMS) certified to ISO 14001, with targets to reduce carbon emissions by 30% by 2030 and zero waste to landfill by 2027.

locations.address: Unit 5-7, Riverside Industrial Estate, Birmingham, B12 8QT
locations.construction_type: Steel frame with composite cladding and concrete floor
locations.occupancy: Main manufacturing facility - CNC machining, stamping, and assembly operations

locations.address: Building 12, Coventry Business Park, Coventry, CV3 4FJ
locations.construction_type: Steel portal frame with insulated metal cladding
locations.occupancy: Secondary manufacturing and quality testing facility
Finished goods storage and distribution warehouse

fire_protection.sprinkler_details: Full wet sprinkler system installed at Birmingham and Coventry sites to LPC Rules. Rugby warehouse has ESFR sprinklers.
fire_protection.smoke_detection_details: Addressable smoke detection systems at all locations connected to 24/7 monitoring station
fire_protection.fire_extinguisher_details: CO2 and powder extinguishers positioned throughout all sites as per fire risk assessment

security.intruder_alarm_details: NSI Gold approved intruder alarm systems at all locations with police response
security.cctv_details: Comprehensive CCTV coverage with 30-day recording retention at all sites
security.fencing_details: 2.4m palisade fencing with electronic access control gates at all locations

loss_history.description: Minor electrical fire in control cabinet - quickly extinguished by staff
Theft of copper cable from external storage area
Burst pipe causing damage to stock and flooring

risk_improvements.fire_risk_assessment: Annual fire risk assessments conducted by external consultant - last assessment October 2024 with all recommendations implemented
risk_improvements.staff_fire_safety_training: All staff receive annual fire safety training including evacuation drills quarterly
risk_improvements.preventive_maintenance: Comprehensive preventive maintenance programme for all machinery with weekly inspections and annual electrical testing (EICR)
risk_improvements.waste_management: Daily removal of swarf and combustible waste. Dedicated external waste storage areas away from buildings.
risk_improvements.hot_work_procedures: Formal hot work permit system in place with fire watch requirements

employee_breakdown.risk_description: Office-based staff including HR, finance, and sales support
Operators of CNC lathes, mills, and grinding machines. Full machine guarding in place. Mandatory PPE including safety glasses and steel toe boots.
Press operators and tool setters. Light curtains and two-hand controls on all presses. Regular PUWER inspections.
CMM operators and inspectors. Low risk office/lab environment
FLT operators and warehouse staff. All FLT operators hold valid licences. Designated pedestrian walkways.
Skilled maintenance engineers. Lock-out/tag-out procedures in place for all maintenance work.

health_and_safety.accident_reporting_system: Electronic accident reporting system with root cause analysis
health_and_safety.ppe_requirements: Full PPE matrix in place - safety glasses, safety boots, hearing protection, gloves as required by task
health_and_safety.training_programme: Comprehensive induction training plus annual refresher. Task-specific training for all machinery operators.
health_and_safety.risk_assessments: Full suite of risk assessments reviewed annually or following any incident

public_and_products_liability.product_description: Precision machined metal components including brackets, housings, shafts, and gears. Sub-assemblies including steering components and suspension parts. All products manufactured to customer specifications.

component_sourcing.raw_materials: Steel and aluminium bar stock sourced from UK stockholders with full material certification
component_sourcing.bought_in_components: Fasteners and standard components from approved UK and EU suppliers

public_and_products_liability.site_access_control: All visitors must sign in and receive safety briefing. High-visibility vests required in production areas. Escorted access only to manufacturing areas.

claims_history.description: Hand injury from sharp edge - minor laceration requiring stitches
Slip on wet floor in washroom area - soft tissue injury to back
Alleged defective batch of brackets - investigation found no fault with our product. Third party damage to customer's assembly line.
